skills.name: Battledance
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each critical hit fill this Champion’s Turn Meter by 10%.
Damage based on
[ATK]
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%

skills.name: Lethal Partner
skills.description:
Places a 30%
[Increase C. RATE]
buff on this Champion, then attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places a 5%
[Poison]
debuff on the target for 3 turns if this attack is critical. [Will ignore 50% of the target’s DEF when Romero is on the same team]
Damage based on
[ATK]
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%

skills.name: Fire of Purgation
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Removes 1 random buff from the target. Has a 75% chance of placing a
[HP Burn]
debuff for 3 turns.
Damage based on
[ATK]
Level 2: Damage +10%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 7: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 8: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Aura
skills.description: Increases Ally C. RATE in the Arena by 20%.
